channel.title: Setting up logo in mobile view on squarespace
channel.description:
[quote] Hi there,
I'm a graphic designer working with a client on a squarespace site http://www.judiththompson.co using the "five" template.
Unfortunately we are unable to view the site logo on the mobile view. This link has been referenced to me for some possible answers but I would prefer it to be done by a coder. http://answers.squarespace.com/questions/9651/add-a-logo-in-the-mobile-menu-for-five-template
Are you able to help?
Thanks Rachael
Rachael Clark Graphic Design [/quote]

item.title: Setting up logo in mobile view on squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Hello Rachel, and thanks for contacting me.

Please do read www.cregox.com/your-home in case you haven't.

Looks like the approaches from that link are indeed overkilling.

Do you mean you want it to look something like this?

In your case, that there's no menu, you can get it with this simple CSS line:

div#page-header div.horizontal-navigation-bar.with-logo {
  display: block;
}

But it also won't look good on screens smaller than 438px, I could just verify.

If you want me to dig deeper, and this is all you need me to do, I can do it for U$123.
